# Core Rule 9 - No shared or multiple accounts Sharing or using multiple accounts will result in punishments for all accounts. You are also responsible for any actions and consequences by others using your account.
## Switching accounts You may change usernames at https://account.spacestation14.com/Identity/Account/Manage
If you lose access to or abandon an account, you must notify admins of your old username at https://forum.spacestation14.com/c/general/4 before creating another account.
